Bringing Comfort to Children in Crisis

We collect stuffed toys for children experiencing trauma and accept gun donations to fund more toys.

What People Are Saying

"The stuffed animal my daughter received after our house fire brought her so much comfort during a difficult time."

— Sarah M., Parent

"I was able to safely dispose of my grandfather's old firearms and support a great cause at the same time."

— James T., Donor

"As a first responder, I've seen firsthand how these stuffed animals help children cope with trauma."

— Officer Rodriguez
